name: Saner Color and Admin Settings
author: Hugo Saner

sections.description:
Simply it gives you greater control over the admin section allowing the colours to match the theme of your website. You can also replace WordPress logos with your very own or just have them blank. It doesnâ€™t stop there, you can also remove unwanted menus and the WordPress upgrade message for non admins.

  1. Change the colors of your admin section
  2. Replace WordPress logo in Admin Bar with your own logo
  3. Replace WordPress logo on Login Screen
  4. Remove unwanted menu items for non admins
sections.installation:
1. Upload saner-admin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Having problems with the plugin, need support or want to request a function?

Please visit Saner Design Projects

short_description: Change the colors of your dashboard, add your own logo to the head and login sections and hide sections that won't be used.
